Reference

ggplot2 helpers

Use ghibli in ggplot2 workflows.

scale_colour_ghibli_c() scale_color_ghibli_c() scale_fill_ghibli_c()

Continuous scales to use for ggplot2

scale_colour_ghibli_d() scale_color_ghibli_d() scale_fill_ghibli_d()

Discrete scales to use for ggplot2

Palette helpers

Use ghibli palettes.

ghibli_palette()

A Studio Ghibli palette generator

ghibli_palettes

Complete list of available ghibli palettes
